WorkItem.Description:
Rawr greatly over values "threat", and to a lesser extent, "survival", in placing gear in the comparison window.  Rawr is placing DPS items with no substantial tank stats other than armor and stamina at the top of the comparison lists.  For example:
 
The top rated helm is 
 
Obsidian Greathelm
- Armor 1908 
- Stam 145
- Str 98
- Crit 76
- Expertise 59
 
While this is a fine helm, I very much doubt any Tankadin will be wearing it for tanking heroics or raids.  The calcualtions need to put more emphasis on defense rating and the other various mitigation values (block rating, block value, dodge, parry), and less value on "Threat."  Also survival, while an important component, also feels a bit overvalued.

Comments.Message: See the Options tab, this is not an issue.
In the options tab you can set the threat scale value to anything.
I will see about adjusting the default Threat scale value. I haven't really done much with Tankadin at 80 since I have been busy playing at 80.
